Author: FaithInMyPants
Text: Hang in there! I've been where you are in the past and I'm not totally out of it, but the days do get better. Keep taking your meds and hang in there. Counselling also helps me a ton, so I think that will help you too if you are able to get that. I wish there was something else I could say to encourage you. But your friends and family love you. Lean on them!
